pr_title: Automatic tracing for Jobs defined in quartz-jobs dependency

timeline.message: Automatic tracing for Jobs defined in quartz-jobs dependency
Add changelog entry and change documentation for quartz
Add changelog entry and change documentation for quartz

timeline.bodyText:
This works, but I prefer the boolean expression more explicit and clearer for reading:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    return isInAnyPackage(applicationPackages, ElementMatchers.<NamedElement>none())
          
          
            
                        .or(nameStartsWith("org.quartz.job"))
          
          
            
                    (isInAnyPackage(applicationPackages, ElementMatchers.<NamedElement>none()).or(nameStartsWith("org.quartz.job")))
          
      
    
    
  

Not insisting on it though.
timeline.author: eyalkoren
